title: All communications between MD. Assistant Attorney William F. Howard and FBI and or U.S. Dept. of Justice Pertaining to a Charles R. Longo.

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Maryland Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I'm looking for 
1) all communications between MD. Assistant Attorney, William F. Howard and FBI and  Pertaining either directly or indirectly to a Charles R. Longo and/or Longo's National Training Systems, Shippers Choice
2)  all communications between MD. Assistant Attorney, William F. Howard and U.S. Dept. of Justice Pertaining either directly or indirectly to a Charles R. Longo and/or Longo's National Training Systems, Shippers Choice
3) all MD. Attorney General documents pertaining to the dropping of alleged criminal charges against a Mark Cary Sapperstein or his father, Gilbert Sapperstein pertaining to any criminal activity, (possibly  alleged bookmaking operations) other than the stealing of the approx. $3.5 million from the Baltimore School Board.
4)all communications between MD. assistant Attorney, William F. Howard and Maryland State Police Pertaining  either directly or indirectly to a Charles R. Longo and/or Longo's National Training Systems, Shippers Choice

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Don Stone
